name: bibimbap
description: Bibimbap — is my favorite Korean dish. It is a warm steamed white rice on the bottom of a bowl, and namul (sautéed and seasoned vegetables), gochujang (hot pepper soybean paste), and sesame oil over the rice. You have to mix it well with a spoon just before eating.
author: Alexander Yatkevich <ayatkevich@gmail.com>
